title: The four key groups Boris Johnson needs to win to get his Brexit deal through Parliament
text:
Boris Johnson has his deal. Now he has to get it through Parliament. Like his predecessor, Theresa May, Mr Johnson was forced to ignore the complaints of the DUP to get a deal over the line. But in doing so, he’s made the parliamentary maths that much harder. So will he meet with the same fate as Mrs May in the Commons on Saturday?

Mr Johnson needs around 320 votes for his deal to get through, although abstentions could change this. However, there are now only 287 voting Conservative MPs are by-elections, resignations and expulsions reduced their numbers.

So to win, Mr Johnson will need to keep all 287 Tories on board and pick up more than 30 votes from elsewhere. Here are the key groups he...
